title: Frontend Developer Intern
description: Join our frontend team to build responsive web applications using React, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Backend Developer Intern
description: Work on server-side development using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. Learn about API development and database design.

title: UI/UX Design Intern
description: Create beautiful user interfaces and user experiences. Work with Figma, Adobe Creative Suite, and design systems.

title: Data Science Intern
description: Analyze large datasets, build machine learning models, and create data visualizations using Python and related libraries.

title: Mobile App Developer Intern
description: Develop mobile applications for iOS and Android using React Native or Flutter. Learn mobile app development best practices.
